headline: Prediction AMD Will Soar Over the Next 5 Years. Here's 1 Reason Why.
summary: In the current environment, it seems antithetical to say anything positive about Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD).  The semiconductor stock has lost more than 60% of its value over the last 13 months as industry struggles and tariff-related worries have weighed on the company.  Despite tariff-related worries and Nvidia's market lead, it could be AMD's time to succeed with artificial intelligence (AI).
